name: Business Problems
text: Give to the Tony Stark player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Tony Stark → remove Business Problems from the game. - Exhaust each upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

flavor: Whiplash has seized control of a power plant, threatening to overload the transformers if his demands are not met.
name: Imminent Overload
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.

flavor: "You started this, Tony. I will finish it."
name: Whiplash
text: Retaliate 1 (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)

boost_text: If the villain is making an undefended attack, choose and discard an upgrade you control.
name: Electric Whip Attack
text: When Revealed: Choose to either deal 1 damage to your hero for each upgrade you control or choose and discard an upgrade you control.

name: Electromagnetic Backlash
text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck. For each printed [energy] resource a player discards this way, that player takes 1 damage.

name: Family Emergency
text: Give to the Carol Danvers player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Carol Danvers → remove Family Emergency from the game. - You are stunned. This card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

flavor: The Psych-Magnitron is a Kree device with the power to turn thoughts into reality. In the hands of Yon-Rogg, it would be a devestating weapon.
name: The Psych-Magnitron
text: When Revelead: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.

flavor: "It isn't real power unles they fear you"
name: Yon-Rogg
text: [star] Forced Response: After Yon-Rogg attacks, place 1 threat on The Psych-Magnitron.

boost_text: If the villain is making an undefended attack, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
name: Kree Manipulator
text: Surge. (After this card resolves, reveal 1 additional encounter card.) When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme.

flavor: "This world now belongs to the Kree empire!" -- Yon-Rogg
name: Yon-Rogg's Treason
text: When Revealed: Discard each [energy] resource from your hand. If you discarded no cards this way, this card gains surge.

name: Affairs of State
text: Give to the T'Challa player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust T'Challa → remove Affairs of State from the game. - Choose and discard a [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

flavor: The renegade, Killmonger, is leading a coup to seize control of Wakanda.
name: Usurp The Throne

flavor: "That should be me on the throne!"
name: Killmonger
text: Killmonger cannot take damage from [[Black Panther]] upgrades.

boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card.
name: Heart-Shaped Herb
text: Surge (After this card resolves, reveal 1 additional encounter card) When Revealed: Give the villain and each minion engaged with you a tough status card.

name: Ritual Combat
text: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. Then, choose to either deal X damage to your hero or place X threat on the main scheme. X is 1 more than the number of boost icons on the discarded encounter card.

name: Legal Work
text: Give to the Jennifer Walters player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Jennifer Walters → remove Legal Work from the game. - Give the main scheme 1 acceleration token. Discard this obligation.

flavor: Titania had held a grudge against She-Hulk for years. She won't rest until she settles the score.
name: Personal Challenge
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.

flavor: "Face it, Greenie. There's only room for one strongest woman... and it ain't you!"
name: Titania
text: X is equal to Titania's remaining hit points.

name: Genetically Enhanced
text:
Attach to the minion with the highest printed hit points. If there are no minions in play, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +3 hit points.

boost_text: Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.
flavor: "This world now belongs to the Kree empire!" -- Yon-Rogg
name: Titania's Fury
text: When Revealed: Titania attacks your hero. If Titania did not attack, heal all damage from Titania and this card gains surge.

name: Eviction Notice
text: Give to the Peter Parker player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Peter Parker → remove Eviction Notice from the game. - Discard 1 card at random from your hand. This card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Highway Robbery
text: When Revealed: Each player places a random card from their hand facedown here. When Defeated: Return each facedown card here to its owner's hand.

flavor: "I'm faster, strong, and smarter than a hundred men my age!"
name: Vulture
text: Quickstrike. (After this minion engages your hero, it attacks.)

boost_text: If this activation deals damage to a friendly character, stun that character.
name: Sweeping Swoop
text: When Revealed: Stun your hero. If Vulture is in play, this card gains surge.

flavor: "Spider-Man will pay for interfering with my plans!" -- The Vulture
name: The Vulture's Plans
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from each player's hand. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different resource type discarded this way.
